commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
.DS_Store



# DOSYA ORGANİZASYON KURALI

# Geçici, test, debug dosyaları .temp/ klasöründe tutulur

# Yeni geçici dosyalar doğrudan .temp/ klasörüne konulmalıdır

# .temp/ klasörü git'e dahil edilmez (opsiyonel)



application/cache/*

!application/cache/index.html



application/logs/*

!application/logs/index.html



!application/*/.htaccess



composer.lock



user_guide_src/build/*

user_guide_src/cilexer/build/*

user_guide_src/cilexer/dist/*

user_guide_src/cilexer/pycilexer.egg-info/*

/vendor/



# IDE Files

#-------------------------

/nbproject/

.idea/*



## Sublime Text cache files

*.tmlanguage.cache

*.tmPreferences.cache

*.stTheme.cache

*.sublime-workspace

*.sublime-project

/tests/tests/

/tests/results/



# Backup files with timestamps

*_20250524*.php

*_20250524*.md



# Upload directories (keep structure but ignore content)

assets/uploads/*

!assets/uploads/.htaccess

!assets/uploads/senetler/.htaccess



# OS generated files

Thumbs.db

ehthumbs.db



# Temporary files

*.tmp

*.temp

*.swp

*.swo



# Log files

*.log



# Development and debugging files

test_*.php

test_*.html

*_test.php

*_debug.php

debug_*.php

cleanup_*.php

clear_*.php

live_*.php

real_time_*.php

quick_fix.php

integrity_check.php

table_diagnostic.php



# VS Code workspace files

.vscode/

.history/

.lh/



# Backup files

*_backup.php

index_backup.php



# Documentation and SQL files (excluded from auto-upload)

*.md

*.sql

!README.md

!MUHASE_README.md

# Sensitive configuration files
application/config/database.php
application/config/sms.php
application/config/email.php
application/config/changelog.json

# Environment files
.env
.env.local
.env.production
